<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Dahak (The Endless Destruction)](/Deities.aspx?ID=150)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 130 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Kill metallic dragons, destroy things at your whim

**Anathema** Spare a foe after you have chosen to kill them, forgive a slight

**Follower Alignments**
CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Constitution

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

**Favored Weapon** [jaws](/Weapons.aspx?ID=1) or [Whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48)

**Domains** [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=8), [Fire](/Domains.aspx?ID=13), [Wyrmkin](/Domains.aspx?ID=57), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=37)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Magic Fang](/Spells.aspx?ID=179)

- **3rd**
[Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119)

- **6th**
[Dragon Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=88)
(chromatic dragons only)

</column>
name: Dahak (The Endless Destruction)
